channel.title: Mistum l #1 Rsps l Nice Staff l Nice Community l
channel.description:
Dear members,
Many of Mistum's Players have been awaiting the release and I'm proud to say it has finally come! We are now finally releasing the official server.
Website
http://mistum.net
Downloads
http://mistum.net/client.jar
Webclient
http://mistum.net/play
Why should you play Mistum Realistic PKing System Daily Community Events Unique features that only Mistum has Many different Boss' to fight Many different minigames Stable economy & market Active friendly community Supportive staff members Many new items (SOL, Korasi, etc) Fully working item effects
Webclient - Requirments
Requirements Java (1.6.0 or higher) implemented on your browser (works for Internet Explorer, Firefox, Opera, Chrome) for more information visit http://www.java.com. Atleast 256 MB RAM.
Desktop Client - Requirments
Java (1.6.0 or higher) installed on your computer for more information visithttp://www.java.com. Atleast 256 MB RAM. Atleast 453 MB free space. Windows, Linux.
(created by Trizimo) Welcome everyone and enjoy! (Some In Game Pictures..etc) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/n5ftjd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/n5ftjd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/315btck.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2d1h86.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/317fxv9.png[/img]
- Mistum Staff Team

Dear members,

Many of Mistum’s Players have been awaiting the release and I’m proud to say it has finally come! We are now finally releasing the official server.

Many different minigames
